import React from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate,Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { signin } from '../auth' const Login = () => { const navigate=useNavigate() const[values,setValues]=useState({ email:'', password:'', error:'', redirectToPage:false }) const{email,password,error,redirectToPage}=values return ( <>
